Class GameEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameEntity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Player

    public abstract class GameEntity
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Aaron Dsouza Super class that has x,y , and velocity, and a rectangle hitbox

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameEntity()
      Creates a GameEnetity object default xVelocity, yVelocity, x and y coordinates, bounding rectangle's height and width
      GameEntity(double x, double y)
      Creates a GameEnetity object with default xVelocity, yVelocity, bounding rectangle's height and width, and custom x and y coordinates
      GameEntity(double x, double y, double xVel, double yVel, double rWidth, double rHeight)
      Creates a GameEnetity object with custom xVelocity, yVelocity, x and y coordinates, bounding rectangle's height and width

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameEntity

        public GameEntity()
        Creates a GameEnetity object default xVelocity, yVelocity, x and y coordinates, bounding rectangle's height and width

      • GameEntity

        public GameEntity(double x,
                  double y,
                  double xVel,
                  double yVel,
                  double rWidth,
                  double rHeight)
        Creates a GameEnetity object with custom xVelocity, yVelocity, x and y coordinates, bounding rectangle's height and width
        Parameters:
        x - x position of the Entity
        y - y position of the Entity
        xVel - x Velocity of the Entity
        yVel - Y Velocity of the Entity
        rWidth - Width of the entity's hit box
        rHeight - Height of the entity's hit box

      • GameEntity

                  double y)
        Creates a GameEnetity object with default xVelocity, yVelocity, bounding rectangle's height and width, and custom x and y coordinates
        Parameters:
        x - x position of the Entity
        y - y position of the Entity
